DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : SECURITIES
DOC.TEXT: Yields_Up on Treasury_Notes : Yields on three-year notes rose in Tuesday ' s auction to the highest level in 15 months.The average yield was 4.83 % , up from 4.44 % at the last auction Nov . 9 . It was the highest rate since three-year notes sold for 5.17 % on Nov . 9 , 1992 . The notes will carry a coupon interest_rate of 4.75 % , with each $ 10 # 000 in face_value selling for $ 9 # 977.90. A total of $ 17.11 billion in notes were sold_out of bids totaling $ 45.6 billion .
